title: Jr 1 Bedroom with Washer/Dryer Included!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 550 Sq.
At The Pinnacle San Francisco Apartments in Nob Hill, you will be delighted to have so many luxuries and conveniences right outside your doorstep.
Get in an invigorating workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center or chill out in our resident lounge while you surf the internet on our high speed Wi-Fi.
Not to mention, our luxury community is conveniently located near a range of dining, shopping and night life destinations.
Are you searching for apartments in Nob Hill, San Francisco?
The Pinnacle at Nob Hill has something for everyone!

Stainless Steel Appliances, Garbage Disposal, Abundant Closet Space, Quartz Countertops, Tile Flooring, Recessed Lighting, Hardwood Floors, Washer & Dryer In Unit*, Private Patios and Balconies*, Central Heat

Online Rental Payment, Dry Sauna, Reserved Garage Parking Available, Responsive Maintenance Team, State of the Art Fitness Center, Concierge / Porter Staffing, Professional Management Team, NEW Rooftop Lounge, Breathtaking Views, Cats Welcome
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
